page.title: 16Brackley school day (girl)
page.content: Today, the 6th of June, I went to school at 8.30a.m.. After assembly we went back to our class for English. We wrote poems about wildlife as this is our project this term. Playtime is at 10.45 and I bought some crisps for 13p. After break was maths. We have been doing graphs. We planted sunflowers and we measure how much they grow each day.We show daily growth on a graph. For school lunch we had hard boiled egg, grated cheese, salad and chips. We had semolina for dessert. After lunch - project work! We have made a pond and planted trees and plants around it. We hope animals and insects will come to it. In the games lesson after play we work for athletics awards. We have to do ten events to get an award. Events include running, jumping and throwing.
